summary: Still traumatized by the disappearance of her three-year-old daughter 15 years ago, Julia Sandburg's old psychic wounds painfully resurface when she meets Louise; a troubled young woman with a checkered past.
cast: Sigourney Weaver|Kate Bosworth|Alessandro Nivola|Keri Russell|Daisy Tahan|David Rasche|Patricia Kalember|Ian McWethy|Elias Koteas|Michael Patterson|Joanna Gleason|Stephen Kunken|Brendan Sexton III|Elisabeth Waterston|Rick Holmes|Jenn Thompson|Jeff Joseph|Jack Rovello|Judith Delgado|Carolyn Leonhart|Teddy Coluca|Michael Wolff|Jeremy Kareken|Brennan Brown|Maury Ginsberg|Angela Reed|Portia|Jenny Maguire|Alex Burns|Danton Stone|Judith Greentree|Daniel Passaro|Curtiss Cook|Flaco Navaja|Lee Shepard|Andrew Stewart-Jones|Mark Irish|Sarah Megan Thomas|Mark Gerrard|Kristen Ruhlin|Felipe Bonilla|Seiko Higuma|Elizabeth Newman|Katharine Powell|Stacey Prussman|Tijuana Ricks|Rich Rothbell|Bill Sorice|Stacey Yen
title: The Girl in the Park
